Primary Energy: Negative 6 (planting compulsion in multiple minds) Supporting Energy: Space 3 (medium range + up to 12 targets) / Time 4 (duration 24 hours) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (up to 12 creatures) Duration: 24 hours (or until completed) Total Cost: 13 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Negative Potential + Negative Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Up to 12 creatures you can see at medium range make Will saves. Compare your weaving successes to each target's save successes. Those you beat follow your suggested course of activity (1-2 sentences) that sounds reasonable. Targets pursue activity for 24 hours or until completing it. Obviously harmful suggestions end weave for that target. Creatures immune to charm are immune. Saving Throw: Will (to resist mental compulsion) Success Scaling: 0 = no effect (per target), 1 = 1 hour, 2 = 24 hours, 3 = 10 days, 4 = 30 days (extremely powerful compulsion)
